column2: Our new province of $PROVINCENAME$ has been added to the local colonial administration.
The people of California have asked, or rather demanded, that we give them self rule. If their demands will not be met, they are threatening war and the intervention of other American powers.
We do not negotiate with rebels
They can have their self rule
The people of California have rebelled against their colonial masters and are asking for our aid. Should we assist them in their fight for freedom?
Kick the Europeans out of the Americas
We will give them financial support
With our position dominant position among the Californias, we can finally join our two nations into a stronger whole
